title: Jagged alliance back in action save game edit mod tool v0050
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
JABiA 1.13g Save Game Editor v0050
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This program *should* be able to modify your Jagged Alliance BIA 1.13g save games. 
This application comes with no warranty or support, use at your own risk.
Have fun

This has been tested on version 1.13g including Shades of red, point blank and crossfire

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Change Log
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Alpha 0.0.5.0
Added a "win lotto" button that gives you $99 Million

Alpha 0.0.4.0
Added a file backup when you open a file so you dont have to do it manually
The output is timestamped to avoid overwriting of existing files

Alpha 0.0.3.0
Optimised character searching in save game file (400% faster). 
Removed warning about slow loading times as no longer required.
Added a load time notification to keep track of processing time
Added a label to show what file is being edited
Filtered out characters that are not valid for the save game
Modified about prompt to load changelog.txt
Added change log (this) file.
Appearance changes

Alpha 0.0.2.0
Bug fixes.

Alpha 0.0.1.0
First release.
